title: FPS Lag After Patch 4.21
body:
Let me start by saying i have never had problems with LoL fps before but after the recent patch iv'e been getting fps dips from a solid 60 to 40-30 FPS any solutions to this or recognition by Riot.

Specs:
CPU- i7 2.4GHZ 
GPU- Geforce GT 635m 2GB (This isn't the most high end PC but i should be able to play LoL at 60 FPS :/ and yes this is a laptop )

replies.body:
I can't be certain on what will work for you, but I've got a pretty decent set up too and I still get some drops in performance when I have anti-aliasing turned on, or shadows set to anything above medium quality. Try turning these off if possible and see if it improves performance at all.

You could also try deleting the "game.cfg" file in the Riot Games folder here: Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
This will reset your hud, video and audio settings. Make any adjustments you normally would on the in game settings and be sure to turn off v-sync again as I've only ever had issues when this is turned on "=,=

Its happens not matter what i can turn all my settings down to the very lowest and ill still get 20-30 FPS and its only gotten worse after that little update that they just put out. its usually happens at either base (mostly red side) or around Dragon or Baron The Dragon/Baron part i get there new and HD and very detailed but the base part i just don't get why i get lag there.

At this point then I'd recommend [lodging a support ticket](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new). You might need to be escalated to our specialist tech team if the usual fixes aren't working for you and they will take an in depth look at your set up to see what could be going on.

I've been getting them too

Not to mention not a FPS drop, but complete full 1 second glitch on my screen to freeze whenever either someone comes into my lane (2 enemies and 1 of me) or I suddenly dive someone under turret...

I nearly died once as Kass cuz I dived a (dumb) Katarina taunting me under turret (on 300hp, easy for me with ult + Q + W + E + Ignite) but I glitched and froze for a full second...I had to flash out >_>

And basically every time (every time) I'm in a solo lane, either top or mid, whenever my screen glitches up for a second, I basically retreat because I know someone is here to gank me.....it's basically how I can tell someone is ganking me...



But back on topic, yeah FPS lag everywhere after 4.21

Hi Strider Hiryu,

I had the same issue when I tried playing on my new PC. I had to move my "Riot Games" folder to my SSD (which is also my system drive) to resolve it. Now plays smooth well over 100 FPS with no freezing.

I can't say that it was from the new patch as I only loaded it up on my new compy after 4.21 anyway.

Let me know if this helps.
